select A.id ,A.nickName ,A.puser_id ,A.title ,A.content ,A.cnt ,A.regdate ,A.tag ,A.choice from (select b.id ,a.nickName ,b.puser_id ,b.title ,b.content ,b.cnt ,b.regdate ,b.tag ,b.choice ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(order by b.id desc) as rnum from pboard1 b left outer join puser a on(b.puser_id=a.id) where b.puser_id=#{id}) A where rnum between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
